name: Lunaria
description:
After your sister has been kidnapped by an evil witch it is on you to free her from her captive and rescue her from his claws.

To do this you must venture through her castle, solve puzzles and progress to the end.
Inspired by classics like Zelda and Portal this demo features  portals to manipulate your surroundings as well as items like mirrors to redirect lasers and open the door, reach the dungeon of the witch and save your sister!

[Level cannot be completed as of yet]
